title: meditation in a mug: superfood lattes for energy, focus & stress
author: Taylor
description: oat milk lattes infused with clinically-effective levels of superfoods to support energy, focus and stress. plant-based and gluten-free with low-sugar added.
cleaned_text: every idea starts with a problem. ours was heart-wrenching: 70% of people deal with stress that leaves them feeling burnt out, anxious and depressed. blossom was founded with a compassionate spirit and clear objective: to use clinically-effective natural medicines as a tool to support mental wellness. more than a metaphor meditation has been practiced for thousands of years to reduce stress and anxiety, improve mood and boost focus. as it turns out, research shows our superfood lattes and meditation have a lot in common.
